trans-unit.source: Task cleanup.
Task execution
Task execution is ‘linear’ but controlled by an interactive debug session.
trans-unit.target: 任务执行是“线性的”，但由交互式调试会话控制。

trans-unit.source: Task execution is as fast as possible per batch as defined by serial (default all). Ansible will not wait for other hosts to finish the current task before queuing more tasks for other hosts. All hosts are still attempted for the current task, but it prevents blocking new tasks for hosts that have already finished.
trans-unit.target: 任务按 serial （默认为全部）定义的每批尽快执行。在为其他主机排队更多任务之前，Ansible不会等待其他主机完成当前任务。仍尝试使用所有主机执行当前任务，但是它可以阻止为已经完成的主机阻止新任务。

trans-unit.source: Task execution is as fast as possible per host in batch as defined by serial (default all). Ansible will not start a play for a host unless the play can be finished without interruption by tasks for another host, i.e. the number of hosts with an active play does not exceed the number of forks. Ansible will not wait for other hosts to finish the current task before queuing the next task for a host that has finished. Once a host is done with the play, it opens it’s slot to a new host that was waiting to start. Other than that, it behaves just like the “free” strategy.
trans-unit.target: 按照 serial （默认为全部）定义，批量执行每个主机的任务要尽可能快。 Ansible不会为主机开始播放，除非该播放可以在不被另一主机任务中断的情况下完成，即具有活动播放的主机数量不超过派生叉的数量。 Ansible不会等待其他主机完成当前任务，然后再为已完成主机的下一个任务排队。一旦主持人完成了该剧，它将为等待开始的新主持人打开插槽。除此之外，它的行为就像“免费”策略。

trans-unit.source: Task execution is in lockstep per host batch as defined by serial (default all). Up to the fork limit of hosts will execute each task at the same time and then the next series of hosts until the batch is done, before going on to the next task.
trans-unit.target: 任务执行在每个主机批处理中都按步进行，如 serial 所定义（默认为全部）。在达到下一个任务的主机限制之前，主机将同时执行每个任务，然后执行下一个系列的主机，直到完成批处理为止。

trans-unit.source: The "activate" status for a VDO volume. If this is set to "no", the VDO volume cannot be started, and it will not start on system startup. However, on initial creation, a VDO volume with "activated" set to "off" will be running, until stopped. This is the default behavior of the "vdo create" command; it provides the user an opportunity to write a base amount of metadata (filesystem, LVM headers, etc.) to the VDO volume prior to stopping the volume, and leaving it deactivated until ready to use.
trans-unit.target: VDO卷的 "激活 "状态。如果这个状态被设置为 "no",那么VDO卷就不能被启动,也不会在系统启动时被启动。然而,在初始创建时,一个将 "activated "设置为 "off "的VDO卷将一直运行,直到被停止。这是 "vdo create "命令的默认行为;它为用户提供了一个机会,在停止VDO卷之前将基本的元数据(文件系统,LVM头等)写入该卷,并使其停用直到准备使用。

trans-unit.source: The “container_command” can be used with any state except “absent”. If used with state “stopped” the container will be “started”, the command executed, and then the container “stopped” again. Likewise if the state is “stopped” and the container does not exist it will be first created, “started”, the command executed, and then “stopped”. If you use a “|” in the variable you can use common script formatting within the variable itself The “container_command” option will always execute as BASH. When using “container_command” a log file is created in the /tmp/ directory which contains both stdout and stderr of any command executed.
trans-unit.target: “ container_command”可以与“不存在”以外的任何状态一起使用。如果在状态“已停止”下使用，则将“启动”容器，执行命令，然后再次“停止”容器。同样，如果状态为“已停止”并且容器不存在，则将首先创建，“启动”，执行命令，然后“已停止”。如果使用“ |” 在变量中，您可以在变量本身内使用通用脚本格式。“ container_command”选项将始终作为BASH执行。使用“ container_command”时，将在/ tmp /目录中创建一个日志文件，其中包含执行的任何命令的stdout和stderr。

trans-unit.source: The community.proxysql.proxysql_scheduler module adds or removes schedules using the proxysql admin interface.
trans-unit.target: 该community.proxysql.proxysql_scheduler模块添加或使用proxysql管理界面中移除了时间表。

trans-unit.source: The community.windows.win_format module formats an existing volume or a new volume on an existing partition on Windows
trans-unit.target: 该community.windows.win_format模块格式现有卷或在Windows上现有的分区的新卷

trans-unit.source: The community.windows.win_initialize_disk module initializes disks
The community.windows.win_partition module can create, modify or delete a partition on a disk
trans-unit.target: 该community.windows.win_partition模块可以创建，修改或磁盘上删除分区

trans-unit.source: The aws_ses_rule_set module allows you to create, delete, and manage SES receipt rule sets
trans-unit.target: 使用aws_ses_rule_set模块可以创建，删除和管理SES收货规则集

trans-unit.source: The bearychat module sends notifications to https://bearychat.com via the Incoming Robot integration.
trans-unit.target: 该bearychat模块发送通知https://bearychat.com通过传入机器人集成。

trans-unit.source: The copy module recursively copy facility does not scale to lots (>hundreds) of files.
trans-unit.target: 该复制模块复制递归设施不能扩展到文件的大量（>上百个）。

trans-unit.source: The expect module is designed for simple scenarios. For more complex needs, consider the use of expect code with the shell or script modules. (An example is part of the shell module documentation)
trans-unit.target: 该预期模块设计用于简单的场景。对于更复杂的需求，请考虑将期望代码与shell或脚本模块一起使用。（一个示例是shell模块文档的一部分）

trans-unit.target: 该字典视图上为什么信息条目 list filter 是必要的在这里。

trans-unit.source: The proxysql_backend_servers module adds or removes mysql hosts using the proxysql admin interface.
trans-unit.target: 该proxysql_backend_servers模块添加或删除MySQL使用proxysql管理界面的主机。

trans-unit.source: The proxysql_global_variables module gets or sets the proxysql global variables.
trans-unit.target: 该proxysql_global_variables模块获取或设置proxysql全局变量。

trans-unit.source: The proxysql_mysql_users module adds or removes mysql users using the proxysql admin interface.
trans-unit.target: 该proxysql_mysql_users模块添加或删除MySQL使用proxysql管理界面的用户。

trans-unit.source: The proxysql_query_rules module modifies query rules using the proxysql admin interface.
trans-unit.target: 该proxysql_query_rules使用proxysql管理界面模块修改查询规则。

trans-unit.source: The proxysql_scheduler module adds or removes schedules using the proxysql admin interface.
trans-unit.target: 该proxysql_scheduler模块添加或使用proxysql管理界面中移除了时间表。

trans-unit.source: The sefcontext module does not modify existing files to the new SELinux context(s), so it is advisable to first create the SELinux file contexts before creating files, or run restorecon manually for the existing files that require the new SELinux file contexts.
trans-unit.target: 该sefcontext模块不修改现有的文件到新的SELinux（S），所以最好是创建文件，或运行前先创建SELinux的文件上下文 restorecon 手动为需要新的SELinux文件上下文中的现有文件。

trans-unit.source: The win_format module formats an existing volume or a new volume on an existing partition on Windows
trans-unit.target: 该win_format模块格式现有卷或在Windows上现有的分区的新卷

trans-unit.source: The win_partition module can create, modify or delete a partition on a disk
trans-unit.target: 该win_partition模块可以创建，修改或磁盘上删除分区

trans-unit.source: The --vault-id flag allows different vault passwords for different users or different levels of access. The output includes the user name my_user from your ansible-vault command and uses the YAML syntax key: value:
trans-unit.target: 该 --vault-id 标记允许为不同的用户或不同级别的访问不同的保管密码。输出包括您的 my_user ansible-vault 命令中的用户名my_user，并使用YAML语法 key: value ：

trans-unit.source: The cli_parse module parses semi-structured data such as network configurations into structured data to allow programmatic use of the data from that device. You can pull information from a network device and update a CMDB in one playbook. Use cases include automated troubleshooting, creating dynamic documentation, updating IPAM (IP address management) tools and so on.
trans-unit.target: 所述cli_parse模块解析半结构化数据，如网络配置成结构化数据，以允许编程使用从该设备的数据。您可以从网络设备中提取信息，并在一本剧本中更新CMDB。用例包括自动故障排除，创建动态文档，更新IPAM（IP地址管理）工具等。

trans-unit.source: The arista.eos.eos_config and vyos.vyos.vyos_config modules have a backup: option that when set will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made. The backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 该arista.eos.eos_config和vyos.vyos.vyos_config模块有一个 backup: 选项，在设置时会导致模块创建当前的完整备份 running-config 从远程设备进行任何更改之前。备份文件将写入到剧本根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: The eos_config and vyos_config modules have a backup: option that when set will cause the module to create a full backup of the current running-config from the remote device before any changes are made. The backup file is written to the backup folder in the playbook root directory. If the directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 该eos_config和vyos_config模块有一个 backup: 选项，在设置时会导致模块创建当前的完整备份 running-config 从远程设备进行任何更改之前。备份文件将写入到剧本根目录中的 backup 文件夹中。如果该目录不存在，则会创建该目录。

trans-unit.source: The vmware_guest module manages various operations related to virtual machines in the given ESXi or vCenter server.
trans-unit.target: 该vmware_guest模块管理与给定ESXi或vCenter Server的虚拟机的各种操作。

trans-unit.source: The ansible ad hoc command specifically uses a different callback plugin for stdout, so there is an extra setting in Ansible Configuration Settings you need to add to use the stdout callback defined above:
trans-unit.target: 该ansible特设专门命令使用不同的回调插件标准输出，所以在额外设置Ansible配置设置您需要添加使用上面定义的标准输出回调：

trans-unit.source: The --ask-vault-pass and --vault-password-file options can be used as long as only a single password is needed for any given run.
trans-unit.target: 该 --ask-vault-pass 和 --vault-password-file 选项可用于只要需要对任何给定的运行只有一个密码。

trans-unit.source: The --ask-vault-pass or --vault-password-file options can be used to specify one of the passwords, but it’s generally cleaner to avoid mixing these with --vault-id.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 --ask-vault-pass 或 --vault-password-file 选项指定其中一个密码，但是通常更干净一些，避免将它们与 --vault-id 混合使用。

trans-unit.source: The --vault-id can be used in lieu of the --vault-password-file or --ask-vault-pass options, or it can be used in combination with them.
trans-unit.target: 该 --vault-id 可以代替的使用 --vault-password-file 或 --ask-vault-pass 选项，也可以与它们结合使用。

trans-unit.source: The --vault-id option can also be used without specifying a vault-id. This behavior is equivalent to --ask-vault-pass or --vault-password-file so is rarely used.
trans-unit.target: 该 --vault-id 选项，也可以不指定金库-ID使用。此行为等效于 --ask-vault-pass 或 --vault-password-file ,因此很少使用。

trans-unit.source: The --vault-id option can also be used without specifying a vault-id. This behaviour is equivalent to --ask-vault-pass or --vault-password-file so is rarely used.
trans-unit.target: 该 --vault-id 选项，也可以不指定金库-ID使用。此行为等效于 --ask-vault-pass 或 --vault-password-file ,因此很少使用。

trans-unit.source: The --vault-password-file option can also be used with the ansible-pull command if you wish, though this would require distributing the keys to your nodes, so understand the implications – vault is more intended for push mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果 --vault-password-file 选项也可以与ansible-pull命令一起使用，尽管这需要将密钥分配给您的节点，所以请理解其含义– Vault更适合于推送模式。

trans-unit.source: The ansible-vault encrypt_string command encrypts and formats any string you type (or copy or generate) into a format that can be included in a playbook, role, or variables file. To create a basic encrypted variable, pass three options to the ansible-vault encrypt_string command:
trans-unit.target: 该ansible穹顶encrypt_string命令加密和格式键入（或复制或产生）的任何字符串转换成可以被包含在一个剧本，角色，或变量文件的格式。要创建基本的加密变量，请将三个选项传递给ansible-vault crypto_string命令：

trans-unit.source: The ansible-vault encrypt_string command will encrypt and format a provided string into a format that can be included in ansible-playbook YAML files.
trans-unit.target: 该ansible穹顶encrypt_string命令将加密并提供的字符串格式化成可以被包含在一个格式ansible-剧本 YAML文件。

trans-unit.source: The command module does not support extended shell syntax like piping and redirects (although shell variables will always work). If your command requires shell-specific syntax, use the shell module instead. Read more about the differences on the Working With Modules page.
trans-unit.target: 该命令模块不支持这样的管道和重定向扩展shell语法（尽管shell变量会一直工作）。如果您的命令需要特定于 shell 的语法，请改用shell模块。在“使用模块”页面上了解有关差异的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The command and shell modules care about return codes, so if you have a command whose successful exit code is not zero, you can do this:
trans-unit.target: 该命令和外壳模块关心的返回码，所以如果你有它的成功退出代码不为零的命令，你可以这样做：

trans-unit.source: The ansible.builtin.file module allows changing ownership and permissions on files. These same options can be passed directly to the copy module as well:
trans-unit.target: 该ansible.builtin.file模块允许改变的文件所有权和权限。这些相同的选项也可以直接传递给 copy 模块：

trans-unit.source: The host_group_vars plugin shipped with Ansible enables reading variables from Assigning a variable to one machine: host variables and Assigning a variable to many machines: group variables.
trans-unit.target: Ansible附带的host_group_vars插件使您可以读取将变量分配给一台机器：主机变量，以及将变量分配给许多机器：组变量。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_api connection plugin talks directly to the Docker daemon to connect to Docker containers and execute modules in them.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_api连接插件直接会谈，以泊坞窗守护程序连接到Docker容器并在他们执行的模块。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_compose module allows you to use your existing Docker compose files to orchestrate containers on a single Docker daemon or on Swarm. Supports compose versions 1 and 2.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_compose模块允许您使用您现有的码头工人组成文件到一个单一的码头工人守护进程或群协调容器。支持撰写版本1和2。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_config module allows you to create and modify Docker Swarm configs.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_config模块允许你创建和修改多克群CONFIGS。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker connection plugin uses the Docker CLI utility to connect to Docker containers and execute modules in them. It essentially wraps docker exec and docker cp. This connection plugin is supported by the ansible.posix.synchronize module.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker连接插件使用泊坞窗CLI实用工具连接到Docker容器并在他们执行的模块。它实际上包装了 docker exec 和 docker cp 。此连接插件受ansible.posix.synchronize模块支持。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_container_info module allows you to inspect a Docker container.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_container_info模块允许你检查一个泊坞窗容器。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_container module manages the container lifecycle by providing the ability to create, update, stop, start and destroy a Docker container.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_container模块提供创建，更新，停止，启动和销毁泊坞容器的能力，管理的容器的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_containers inventory plugin allows you to dynamically add Docker containers from a Docker Daemon to your Ansible inventory. See Working with dynamic inventory for details on dynamic inventories.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_containers库存插件，您可以动态地从一个码头工人守护进程添加Docker容器您Ansible库存。有关动态库存的详细信息，请参见使用动态库存。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_host_info module allows you to retrieve information on a Docker daemon, such as all containers, images, volumes, networks and so on.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_host_info模块允许您检索一个码头工人守护进程的信息，如所有的容器，图片，数量，网络等等。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_image_info module allows you to list and inspect images.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_image_info模块可以让你列表和检查图像。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_image module provides full control over images, including: build, pull, push, tag and remove.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_image模块提供了图像，包括完全控制：建立，拉，推，标签和删除。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_login module allows you to log in and out of a remote registry, such as Docker Hub or a private registry. It provides similar functionality to the docker login and docker logout CLI commands.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_login模块允许您登录和退出远程注册表，如码头工人集线器或私人注册的。它提供了与 docker login 和 docker logout CLI命令类似的功能。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_machine inventory plugin allows you to dynamically add Docker Machine hosts to your Ansible inventory.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_machine库存插件，允许你动态添加泊坞窗机主机您Ansible库存。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_network_info module allows you to inspect Docker networks.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_network_info模块允许你检查泊坞网络。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_network module provides full control over Docker networks.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_network模块提供了多克网络的完全控制。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_node_info module allows you to retrieve information on Docker Swarm nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_node_info模块允许您检索泊坞群节点的信息。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_node module allows you to manage Docker Swarm nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_node模块允许你管理泊坞群节点。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_prune module allows you to prune no longer needed containers, images, volumes and so on. It provides similar functionality to the docker prune CLI command.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_prune模块可以让你修剪不再需要的容器，图像，卷等。它提供了与 docker prune CLI命令类似的功能。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_secret module allows you to create and modify Docker Swarm secrets.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_secret模块允许你创建和修改多克群的秘密。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_stack module module allows you to control Docker stacks. Information on stacks can be retrieved by the community.docker.docker_stack_info module, and information on stack tasks can be retrieved by the community.docker.docker_stack_task_info module.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_stack模块模块允许您控制泊坞栈。可以通过community.docker.docker_stack_info模块检索有关堆栈的信息，并且可以通过community.docker.docker_stack_task_info模块检索有关堆栈任务的信息。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_swarm_info module allows you to retrieve information on Docker Swarm.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_swarm_info模块允许您检索泊坞群信息。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_swarm inventory plugin allows you to dynamically add all Docker Swarm nodes to your Ansible inventory.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_swarm库存插件可以让你所有的码头工人群节点动态地添加到您的Ansible库存。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_swarm module allows you to globally configure Docker Swarm manager nodes to join and leave swarms, and to change the Docker Swarm configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_swarm模块允许您配置全局泊坞群经理节点加入和离开蜂拥而来，并改变泊坞窗群的配置。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_volume_info module provides full control over Docker volumes.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_volume_info模块提供了码头工人卷的完全控制。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker.docker_volume module allows you to inspect Docker volumes.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker.docker_volume模块允许你检查泊坞窗卷。

trans-unit.source: The aci_rest module accepts the native XML and JSON payloads, but additionally accepts inline YAML payload (structured like JSON). The XML payload requires you to use a path ending with .xml whereas JSON or YAML require the path to end with .json.
trans-unit.target: 所述aci_rest模块接受本地XML和JSON有效载荷，但附加地接受直列YAML有效载荷（结构类似于JSON）。XML有效负载要求您使用以 .xml 结尾的路径，而JSON或YAML要求使用以 .json 结尾的路径。

trans-unit.source: The aci_rest module is a wrapper around the APIC REST API. As a result any issues related to the APIC will be reflected in the use of this module.
trans-unit.target: 该aci_rest模块是围绕APIC REST API的包装。结果，与APIC相关的任何问题都将反映在此模块的使用中。

trans-unit.source: The aci_rest module provides you with direct access to the APIC REST API and enables you to perform any task not already covered by the existing modules. This may seem like a complex undertaking, but you can generate the needed REST payload for any action performed in the ACI web interface effortlessly.
trans-unit.target: 该aci_rest模块为您提供了直接访问APIC REST API，使您能够执行尚未由现有模块覆盖的任何任务。这看起来似乎很复杂，但是您可以毫不费力地为在ACI Web界面中执行的任何操作生成所需的REST有效负载。

trans-unit.source: The blockinfile module had its follow parameter removed because it inherently modifies the content of an existing file so it makes no sense to operate on the link itself.
trans-unit.target: 该blockinfile模块有其 follow 参数删除，因为它，所以它是没有意义的链接本身固有的操作修改现有文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The command module does not support extended shell syntax like piping and redirects (although shell variables will always work). If your command requires shell-specific syntax, use the shell module instead. Read more about the differences on the Working With Modules page.
trans-unit.target: 该命令模块不支持这样的管道和重定向扩展shell语法（尽管shell变量会一直工作）。如果您的命令需要特定于 shell 的语法，请改用shell模块。在“ 使用模块”页面上了解有关差异的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The file – Manage files and file properties now emits a deprecation warning when src is specified with a state other than hard or link as it is only supposed to be useful with those. This could have an effect on people who were depending on a buggy interaction between src and other state’s to place files into a subdirectory. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 当将 src 指定为 hard 或 link 以外的状态时，文件– Manage files and file properties现在会发出弃用警告，因为该状态仅对这些有用。这可能会对那些依赖src与其他状态之间的错误交互以将文件放入子目录的人们产生影响。例如：

trans-unit.source: The file module changed from follow=False to follow=True because its purpose is to modify the attributes of a file and most systems do not allow attributes to be applied to symlinks, only to real files.
trans-unit.target: 该文件模块更改从 follow=False 以 follow=True 因为它的目的是修改一个文件的属性，最系统不允许属性被应用到符号链接，只有真正的文件。

trans-unit.source: The file module allows changing ownership and permissions on files. These same options can be passed directly to the copy module as well:
trans-unit.target: 该文件模块允许改变的文件所有权和权限。这些相同的选项也可以直接传递给 copy 模块：

trans-unit.source: The replace module had its follow parameter removed because it inherently modifies the content of an existing file so it makes no sense to operate on the link itself.
trans-unit.target: 在更换模块有其 follow 参数删除，因为它，所以它是没有意义的链接本身固有的操作修改现有文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The stat and win_stat modules have changed the default of the option get_md5 from true to false.
trans-unit.target: 该统计和win_stat模块已经改变了选项的默认 get_md5 从 true 到 false 。

trans-unit.source: The win_get_url module has the dictionary win_get_url in its results deprecated, its content is now also available directly in the resulting output, like other modules. This dictionary will be removed in Ansible 2.8.
trans-unit.target: 所述win_get_url模块具有字典 win_get_url 在其结果弃用，现在它的内容也可直接在所得到的输出，与其他模块。该字典将在Ansible 2.8中删除。

trans-unit.source: The win_package module return values exit_code and restart_required have been deprecated in favour of rc and reboot_required respectively. The deprecated return values will be removed in Ansible 2.6.
trans-unit.target: 该win_package模块返回值 exit_code 和 restart_required 已经被弃用，取而代之的 rc 和 reboot_required 分别。不推荐使用的返回值将在Ansible 2.6中删除。

trans-unit.source: The win_shell and win_command modules now properly preserve quoted arguments in the command-line. Tasks that attempted to work around the issue by adding extra quotes/escaping may need to be reworked to remove the superfluous escaping. See Issue 23019 for additional detail.
trans-unit.target: 现在，win_shell和win_command模块可以在命令行中正确保留带引号的参数。试图通过添加额外的引号/转义来解决此问题的任务可能需要重新设计，以删除多余的转义。有关更多详细信息，请参见问题23019。

trans-unit.source: The win_unzip module no longer includes the dictionary win_unzip in its results; the contents are now included directly in the resulting output, like other modules.
trans-unit.target: 所述win_unzip模块不再包括字典 win_unzip 在它的结果; 现在，像其他模块一样，内容也直接包含在结果输出中。

trans-unit.source: The DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY configuration option tells Ansible modules to use a specific syslog facility when logging information on all managed machines. Due to a bug with older Ansible versions, this setting did not affect machines using journald with the systemd Python bindings installed. On those machines, Ansible log messages were sent to /var/log/messages, even if you set DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY. Ansible 2.7 fixes this bug, routing all Ansible log messages according to the value set for DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY. If you have DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY configured, the location of remote logs on systems which use journald may change.
trans-unit.target: 该DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY配置选项告诉Ansible模块使用特定的syslog工具登录所有管理的计算机信息时。由于较旧的Ansible版本存在错误，因此此设置不会影响使用安装了系统化Python绑定的日志记录的计算机。在这些计算机上，即使您设置了DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY，Ansible日志消息也会发送到 /var/log/messages 。 Ansible 2.7修复了此错误，并根据DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY设置的值路由所有Ansible日志消息。如果已配置DEFAULT_SYSLOG_FACILITY，则使用日志记录的系统上远程日志的位置可能会更改。

trans-unit.source: The DEFAULT_VAULT_ID_MATCH config option can be set so that Ansible will only use the password with the same label as the encrypted data. This is more efficient and may be more predictable when multiple passwords are used.
trans-unit.target: 该DEFAULT_VAULT_ID_MATCH配置选项可以设置，以便Ansible只会与同标号的加密数据使用的密码。当使用多个密码时，这更有效，并且可能更可预测。

trans-unit.source: The GALAXY_SERVER_LIST option is a list of server identifiers in a prioritized order. When searching for a collection, the install process will search in that order, e.g. automation_hub first, then my_org_hub, release_galaxy, and finally test_galaxy until the collection is found. The actual Galaxy instance is then defined under the section [galaxy_server.{{ id }}] where {{ id }} is the server identifier defined in the list. This section can then define the following keys:
trans-unit.target: 该GALAXY_SERVER_LIST选项是服务器标识符以优先顺序列表。当搜索集合时，安装过程将按该顺序搜索，例如，首先是 automation_hub ，然后是 my_org_hub ， release_galaxy ，最后是 test_galaxy ,直到找到集合为止。然后，在 [galaxy_server.{{ id }}] 部分下定义实际的Galaxy实例，其中 {{ id }} 是列表中定义的服务器标识符。然后，此部分可以定义以下键：

trans-unit.source: The acme_account module allows to modify, create and delete ACME accounts.
trans-unit.target: 该acme_account模块允许修改，创建和删除帐户ACME。

trans-unit.source: The community.crypto.acme_account module allows to modify, create and delete ACME accounts.
trans-unit.target: 该community.crypto.acme_account模块允许修改，创建和删除帐户ACME。

trans-unit.source: The acme_certificate module also allows to do basic account management. When using both modules, it is recommended to disable account management for acme_certificate. For that, use the modify_account option of acme_certificate.
trans-unit.target: 该acme_certificate模块还允许做基本的帐户管理。同时使用两个模块时，建议禁用acme_certificate的帐户管理。为此，使用 modify_account 的选项acme_certificate。

trans-unit.source: The community.crypto.acme_certificate module also allows to do basic account management. When using both modules, it is recommended to disable account management for community.crypto.acme_certificate. For that, use the modify_account option of community.crypto.acme_certificate.
trans-unit.target: 该community.crypto.acme_certificate模块还允许做基本的帐户管理。同时使用两个模块时，建议禁用community.crypto.acme_certificate的帐户管理。为此，使用 modify_account 的选项community.crypto.acme_certificate。

trans-unit.source: The log_plays callback is an example of how to record playbook events to a log file, and the mail callback sends email on playbook failures.
trans-unit.target: 该log_plays回调是如何记录剧本事件日志文件的示例，以及邮件回调发送电子邮件的剧本故障。

trans-unit.source: The say callback responds with computer synthesized speech in relation to playbook events.
trans-unit.target: 该说的回调与有关的剧本事件的计算机合成语音响应。

trans-unit.source: The docker_stack module is not included in the docker defaults group.
trans-unit.target: 所述docker_stack模块不包括中 docker 默认组。

trans-unit.source: The community.aws.ec2_instance and community.aws.ec2_asg modules can, instead of specifying all parameters on those tasks, be passed a Launch Template which contains settings like instance size, disk type, subnet, and more.
trans-unit.target: 该community.aws.ec2_instance和community.aws.ec2_asg模块可以，而不是指定的那些任务的所有参数，传递一个启动模板包含了像实例大小，磁盘类型，子网和更多的设置。

trans-unit.source: The ansible-lint default rules page describes each error. For [403], the recommended fix is to change state: latest to state: present in the playbook.
trans-unit.target: 该ansible皮棉默认规则页面介绍了每个错误。对于 [403] ，建议的解决方法是将 state: latest 更改为 state: present 于剧本中。

trans-unit.source: The vmware_guest module manages various operations related to virtual machines in the given ESXi or vCenter server.
trans-unit.target: 该vmware_guest模块管理与给定ESXi或vCenter Server的虚拟机的各种操作。

trans-unit.source: The log_plays callback is an example of how to record playbook events to a log file, and the mail callback sends email on playbook failures.

trans-unit.source: The say callback responds with computer synthesized speech in relation to playbook events.
trans-unit.target: 该说的回调与有关的剧本事件的计算机合成语音响应。

trans-unit.source: The netconf connection plugin provides a connection to remote devices over the SSH NETCONF subsystem. Network devices typically use this connection plugin to send and receive RPC calls over NETCONF.
trans-unit.target: 所述NETCONF连接插件提供在到远程设备的连接 SSH NETCONF 子系统。网络设备通常使用此连接插件通过 NETCONF 发送和接收 RPC 调用。

trans-unit.source: The network_cli connection type uses paramiko_ssh under the hood which creates a pseudo terminal to send commands and receive responses. network_cli loads two platform specific plugins based on the value of ansible_network_os:
trans-unit.target: 所述network_cli连接类型使用 paramiko_ssh 它创建了一个伪终端发送命令和接收响应的罩下。 network_cli 基于 ansible_network_os 的值加载两个特定于平台的插件：

trans-unit.source: The ansible.netcommon collection version 1.2.0 or later includes the cli_parse module that can run CLI commands and parse the semi-structured text output. You can use the cli_parse module on a device, host, or platform that only supports a command-line interface and the commands issued return semi-structured text. The cli_parse module can either run a CLI command on a device and return a parsed result or can simply parse any text document. The cli_parse module includes cli_parser plugins to interface with a variety of parsing engines.
trans-unit.target: 所述ansible.netcommon集合版本1.2.0或更新的包括cli_parse可以运行CLI命令和解析半结构化的文本输出模块。您可以在仅支持命令行界面的设备，主机或平台上使用 cli_parse 模块，并且发出的命令将返回半结构化文本。所述 cli_parse 模块可以在设备上运行CLI命令并返回解析的结果，或者可以简单地解析任何文本文档。该 cli_parse 模块包括cli_parser插件与各种解析引擎的接口。

trans-unit.source: The Arista EOS collection supports multiple connections. This page offers details on how each connection works in Ansible and how to use it.
trans-unit.target: 在阿里斯塔EOS收集支持多个连接。此页面提供有关每个连接在Ansible中如何工作以及如何使用它的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Cisco IOS collection supports Enable Mode (Privilege Escalation). This page offers details on how to use Enable Mode on IOS in Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 在思科IOS collection支持使能模式（权限提升）。本页提供有关如何在Ansible中的IOS上使用启用模式的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Cisco IOS-XR collection supports multiple connections. This page offers details on how each connection works in Ansible and how to use it.
trans-unit.target: 在思科IOS-XR收集支持多个连接。此页面提供有关每个连接在Ansible中如何工作以及如何使用它的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The cisco.meraki collection only supports the local connection type at this time.
trans-unit.target: 该cisco.meraki集合只支持 local 此时连接类型。

trans-unit.source: The Cisco NXOS supports multiple connections. This page offers details on how each connection works in Ansible and how to use it.
trans-unit.target: 在思科NXOS支持多个连接。此页面提供有关每个连接在Ansible中如何工作以及如何使用它的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The community.docker collection offers several modules and plugins for orchestrating Docker containers and Docker Swarm.
trans-unit.target: 该community.docker收集提供了一些模块和插件编排Docker容器和码头工人群。

trans-unit.source: The dellemc.os10 collection supports Enable Mode (Privilege Escalation). This page offers details on how to use Enable Mode on OS10 in Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 该dellemc.os10集合支持使能模式（权限提升）。本页提供有关如何在Ansible中的OS10上使用启用模式的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The FRR collection supports the ansible.netcommon.network_cli connection. This section provides details on how to use this connection for Free Range Routing (FRR).
trans-unit.target: 该FRR集合支持 ansible.netcommon.network_cli 连接。本节提供有关如何将此连接用于自由范围路由（FRR）的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Juniper Junos OS supports multiple connections. This page offers details on how each connection works in Ansible and how to use it.
trans-unit.target: 在瞻博网络Junos操作系统支持多个连接。此页面提供有关每个连接在Ansible中如何工作以及如何使用它的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The VyOS collection supports the ansible.netcommon.network_cli connection type. This page offers details on connection options to manage VyOS using Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 该VyOS集合支持 ansible.netcommon.network_cli 连接类型。本页提供有关使用Ansible管理VyOS的连接选项的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The docker inventory script is deprecated. Please use the inventory plugin instead. The inventory plugin has several compatibility options. If you need to collect Docker containers from multiple Docker daemons, you need to add every Docker daemon as an individual inventory source.
trans-unit.target: 该搬运工库存脚本已被弃用。请改用广告资源插件。库存插件具有几个兼容性选项。如果需要从多个Docker守护程序中收集Docker容器，则需要将每个Docker守护程序添加为单独的清单源。

trans-unit.source: The dellemc.os6 collection supports Enable Mode (Privilege Escalation). This page offers details on how to use Enable Mode on OS6 in Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 该dellemc.os6集合支持使能模式（权限提升）。本页提供有关如何在Ansible中的OS6上使用启用模式的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The dellemc.os9 collection supports Enable Mode (Privilege Escalation). This page offers details on how to use Enable Mode on OS9 in Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 该dellemc.os9集合支持使能模式（权限提升）。本页提供有关如何在Ansible中的OS9上使用启用模式的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The ansible-examples github repository contains many examples of how variables are used in Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 该ansible示例中找到包含的变量是如何在Ansible使用的例子很多。

trans-unit.source: The cisco.nxos.nxos_overlay_globalanycast_gateway_mac attribute must be set before setting the fabric_forwarding_anycast_gateway property.
trans-unit.target: 该cisco.nxos.nxos_overlay_global anycast_gateway_mac 属性必须设置前设置 fabric_forwarding_anycast_gateway 属性。

trans-unit.source: The nxos_overlay_globalanycast_gateway_mac attribute must be set before setting the fabric_forwarding_anycast_gateway property.
trans-unit.target: 该nxos_overlay_global anycast_gateway_mac 属性必须设置前设置 fabric_forwarding_anycast_gateway 属性。

trans-unit.source: The community.proxysql.proxysql_global_variables module writes the proxysql configuration settings between layers. Currently this module will always report a changed state, so should typically be used with WHEN however this will change in a future version when the CHECKSUM table commands are available for all tables in proxysql.
trans-unit.target: 所述community.proxysql.proxysql_global_variables模块层之间写入proxysql配置设置。当前，此模块将始终报告更改的状态，因此通常应与WHEN一起使用，但是当CHECKSUM table命令可用于proxysql中的所有表时，它将在以后的版本中更改。

trans-unit.source: The proxysql_global_variables module writes the proxysql configuration settings between layers. Currently this module will always report a changed state, so should typically be used with WHEN however this will change in a future version when the CHECKSUM table commands are available for all tables in proxysql.
trans-unit.target: 所述proxysql_global_variables模块层之间写入proxysql配置设置。当前，此模块将始终报告更改的状态，因此通常应与WHEN一起使用，但是当CHECKSUM table命令可用于proxysql中的所有表时，它将在以后的版本中更改。

trans-unit.source: The host_group_vars plugin shipped with Ansible enables reading variables from Assigning a variable to one machine: host variables and Assigning a variable to many machines: group variables.
trans-unit.target: Ansible附带的host_group_vars插件使您可以读取将变量分配给一台机器（主机变量）和将变量分配给许多机器（组变量）的信息。

trans-unit.source: The "key:value,key:value" string format is deprecated and has been removed in version 2.10.
trans-unit.target: 该 "key:value,key:value" 字符串格式已被弃用，在2.10版本已被删除。

trans-unit.source: The "key:value,key:value" string format is deprecated and will be removed in version 2.10.
trans-unit.target: 该 "key:value,key:value" 字符串格式已过时，在2.10版本中移除。

trans-unit.source: The --diff option can reveal sensitive information. This option can disabled for tasks by specifying diff: no.
trans-unit.target: 该 --diff 选项可以透露的敏感信息。通过指定 diff: no 可以为任务禁用此选项。

trans-unit.source: The --diff option for ansible-playbook can be used alone or with --check. When you run in diff mode, any module that supports diff mode reports the changes made or, if used with --check, the changes that would have been made. Diff mode is most common in modules that manipulate files (for example, the template module) but other modules might also show ‘before and after’ information (for example, the user module).
trans-unit.target: --diff -playbook的--diff选项可以单独使用，也可以与 --check 一起使用。当您在diff模式下运行时，任何支持diff模式的模块都会报告所做的更改，如果与 --check 一起使用，则将报告所做的更改。差异模式在处理文件的模块（例如，模板模块）中最常见，但是其他模块也可能显示“前后”信息（例如，用户模块）。
